content:
Yes, many top-ranked business schools offer part-time MBA programs that are designed for working professionals like yourself. Here's a summary of part-time MBA programs offered by some of the top-ranked business schools in Europe:

1. INSEAD: INSEAD has a part-time Executive MBA (EMBA) program that is designed for working executives. The EMBA is a 14-17 month program that is offered in both Europe and Asia.

2. London Business School: The school offers a flexible Executive MBA that can be completed in 15, 18, or 20 months. This program lets you choose between weekend and modular classes to fit your schedule.

3. HEC Paris: HEC Paris offers a part-time Executive MBA program that combines online learning with face-to-face sessions. The program can be completed in 15-18 months and is designed for experienced professionals.

4. IMD Business School: IMD has a Global Executive MBA program that is offered on a part-time basis. This program includes online learning, on-campus modules, and global business trips, and can be completed in 12-24 months.

5. IE Business School: IE Business School offers a part-time Executive MBA program that features a blended format of online learning and in-person classroom sessions. The program can be completed in 15 or 19 months.

6. Saïd Business School, University of Oxford: The school offers a part-time Executive MBA program that is designed for experienced professionals. The program can be completed in 21 months and features 16 week-long modules.

7. Cambridge Judge Business School: The school offers a part-time Executive MBA program that can be completed in 20 months. The program features executive coaching, global residencies, and a flexible schedule.

8. Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University: The school offers a part-time Executive MBA program that includes weekend classes and online learning. The program can be completed in 22 months.

9. ESADE Business School: ESADE offers a part-time Executive MBA program that combines online learning with on-campus classes. The program can be completed in 16 months, and includes a study trip to Silicon Valley.

10. SDA Bocconi School of Management: The school offers a part-time Executive MBA program that can be completed in 20 months. The program includes weekend classes and global business experiences.

Note that the requirements and admission process for part-time MBA programs may vary by school, so be sure to check the individual school websites for more information.
